message: Let's be fair and split the money. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor. Consider this carefully, as the money will be worth less in future rounds.
I think a 55/45 split is fairer, considering the money loses value each round.  Let's get this done so we can both get something.
Bob, let's be realistic.  We both lose if this drags on. I'm willing to compromise slightly from my initial offer. This is your chance to secure a decent amount.
